ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Axe?
ygData.msgSnippet: i was thinking about equipping my lvl 3 guy with a dwarven axe.... what will this do to my character?
ygData.messageBody:
i was thinking about equipping my lvl 3 guy with a dwarven axe.... what will
this do to my character?

Guillaume Voizard wrote:

> From: Guillaume Voizard <gvoizard@...>
>
> > 10pp...... you got taken for a little ride. I've seen em for 7pp.
>
> Well, I was looking for one for a long time, and I was boring to look for
> lowest prices. So I auctioned that I could buy one for 10pp and I had 2
> answers. BTW, hunting in CB, you can make 3pp very quickly, so I don't care.
> And the axe is worth it :o)
>
> Erwin, Paladin of Tunare, Fennin Ro.
